column2: lp <- ggplot(data=df, aes(x=Regularizer, y=Error, group=Algorithm, color=Algorithm)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + scale_x_log10(breaks = 10^(-10:10),labels = trans_format("log10", math_format(10^.x)))+ scale_y_log10(breaks = 10^(-10:10),labels = trans_format("log10", math_format(10^.x)))+ mytheme
